name: Mecha-warlock Zyblyss
description:
Shot project game for Mecha-gamejam

How to play : see How to play in title game.

press enter to pause game.

This game has inspiration from 90s anime-robot such as ng knight ramune and Mashin Hero Wataru. That I have watched since childhood.

Music from wingless Seraph https://wingless-seraph.net/en/index.html

enjoy to play.
